availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George Richard Bibb (Logan County, Kentucky, physician)

body.p: Logan County, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Caldwell Bibb. Father of Lizzie Bibb, Mary Bibb, and Elizabeth Bibb. Attended and graduated from University of Pennsylvania in 1854. Physician in Logan County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in Logan Guards (U.S.A.) as Captain c1861.

ab.bibl: Find A Grave, "George Richard Bibb (1830 - 1915)," Memorial #75141029, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/75141029 (accessed August 8, 2019).; "Graduates of the University of Pennsylvania," The American Journal of the Medical Sciences Vol. 28 (1854), 293.Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Logan County, District 1, p. 484. KYR-0001-019-0091.
